metadata.title: LegacyShield | Secure Digital Estate Planning & Document Vault
metadata.description: Securely store your most precious documents — passports, wills, insurance — with zero-knowledge encryption and emergency access for loved ones.

register.title: Create your account
register.referred: You've been invited by a friend! Create your account to get started with a free encrypted vault.

readiness.title: Legacy Readiness
readiness.subtitle: Essential documents for your loved ones

hero.title: If you died tomorrow, would your family be locked out?
hero.subtitle: Most loved ones spend 6 months fighting banks and cloud providers just to access basic documents. LegacyShield gives them a <strongItem>single unlock phrase</strongItem> to your most important papers — passports, wills, and insurance.
hero.disclaimer: Free forever · No credit card required

features.sectionSubtitle: Built from the ground up for people who take document security seriously.

encryption.title: Military-Grade Encryption
encryption.desc: Your files are encrypted in your browser before they ever leave your device. Not on our servers. Not in transit. On YOUR device. We never see the original — only you hold the key.

emergency.title: Emergency Access
emergency.desc: Designate trusted contacts who can access your vault using a secret unlock phrase. When it matters most, your loved ones won't be locked out.

hosting.title: EU-Only Hosting
hosting.desc: Your encrypted data lives on European-owned servers (Hetzner, Germany) — not AWS, not Google. No US CLOUD Act. No foreign government access. GDPR-native by design.

proof.title: We Can't See Your Files. Literally.
proof.subtitle: This isn't a marketing claim. It's the architecture.

visual.blindText: We can see that a file exists, but we have no way to decrypt it or see its content.

keys.title: You Hold the Keys
keys.desc: Your encryption key is derived from your password and never leaves your device. We don't store it, we don't see it, and we can't reset it.

infra.title: Sovereign Infrastructure
infra.desc: We don't use US-owned cloud providers like AWS or Google Cloud. Your data lives on European-owned hardware in Germany and Finland, protected by strict EU privacy laws.

noReset.title: No Password Reset
noReset.desc: If you lose your password, we can't recover your files. Not our support team, not our engineers. That's how seriously we take your privacy.

noHandover.title: Nothing to Hand Over
noHandover.desc: Even with a court order, we can only provide encrypted data. Without your key, it's useless.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to protect your most important documents.

step1.title: Upload Your Documents
step1.desc: Drag and drop your important files. They're encrypted instantly in your browser.

step2.title: Set Up Emergency Access
step2.desc: Add trusted contacts and create a secret unlock phrase only they would know.

step3.title: Rest Easy
step3.desc: Your documents are safe, encrypted, and accessible to the right people when it matters.

useCases.title: What to Store
useCases.subtitle: The documents you hope you'll never need — but will be glad you saved.

cta.subtitle: Your documents. Your family's peace of mind. Start securing them today.

hero.title: Made in Europe. Owned by Europeans.
hero.subtitle: Your most sensitive documents deserve infrastructure that answers to European law — not American boardrooms.

infrastructure.title: Our Infrastructure
infrastructure.subtitle: We don’t just run in an EU region of an American cloud. We use European-owned infrastructure, end to end.

aws.title: AWS EU Region
aws.subtitle: Still US-owned, still subject to US law
aws.point1: US parent company — subject to CLOUD Act
aws.point2: US government can compel data access
aws.point3: EU data stored on US-owned hardware

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Goes Further
zeroKnowledge.subtitle: Even if someone breached our servers, they’d get nothing but encrypted noise.
zeroKnowledge.point1: We can’t read your files. Not won’t — can’t.
zeroKnowledge.point2: No American service ever touches your unencrypted data.
zeroKnowledge.point3: Your encryption key never leaves your browser.
zeroKnowledge.point4: Even a server breach yields only meaningless encrypted blobs.

honesty.title: What We Can’t Avoid
honesty.subtitle: We believe in transparency. Here’s where US services are involved — and why it doesn’t matter for your files.
honesty.point1: Email delivery (Resend) and payment processing (Stripe) are US-based services. They handle metadata like email addresses — never your encrypted files.
honesty.point2: Your documents are encrypted in your browser before they ever leave your device. These services never see your actual files.
honesty.point3: The separation is absolute: US services handle communication and payments. Your encrypted documents live exclusively on European infrastructure.
